text:
The technology that I choosed, is the computer.
I choose the computer because in information-communication is something that everybody used. In fact, the computer is util and very important for information ans communication because peoples use them everytime.
The computer is a product which allows to people to have access to internet and they can realized lot of advertise or campagn of advertise for example. On the computer there is a programs and software which allows to people to create what they want.
Moreover, people use the computer in their daily life. Lot of things are in internet or needs a computer today.
The computer help people for many task. People use it in their work, especially for mails. In information-communication, people exchanged a lot of messages with internet.
The job of community manager in example consist in work on social media for make advertise on company. So, the community managers need a computer for work properly.
The computer is a technology who evolve whith the time.
 I think that birth of computer it’s a good thing because nowadays is use by everybody. We can makes lot of things with the programs or system that he propose.
The one thing with which I’m not agree is the surconsommation of computer and internet and the pollution it create.
There is lot of programs who are dificult to understand for some people.
On global, the computer is a good thing in information-communication because he help people.
